When the trades are converted, the mob will generate a new trade list with their new trade table, but then it will try to convert any of the same trades over to have the same enchantments and user data. For example, if the original has a Emerald to Enchanted Iron Sword (Sharpness 1), and the new trade also has an Emerald for Enchanted Iron Sword, then the enchantment will be Sharpness 1.

BGE.title: Genetics
BGE.description: Defines the way a mob's genes and alleles are passed on to it's offspring, and how those traits manifest in the child. Compatible parent genes are crossed together, the alleles are handed down from the parents to the child, and any matching genetic variants fire off JSON events to modify the child and express the traits.

CEI.title: Projectile
CEI.description: Allows the entity to be a thrown entity.

anchor.description: Allows you to choose an anchor point for where the projectile is fired from. 0 = Original point, 1 = EyeHeight, and 2 = Middle or body height.
anchor.title: Anchor

angle_offset.description: Alters the angle at which a projectile is vertically shot. Many splash potions in the game use this to offset their angles by -20 degrees.
angle_offset.title: Angle Offset

catch_fire.description: If true, the entity hit will be set on fire.
catch_fire.title: Catch Fire

crit_particle_on_hurt.description: If true, when a projectile deals damage, whether or not to spawn in the critical damage particles.
crit_particle_on_hurt.title: Crit Particle On Hurt

destroy_on_hurt.description: When this projectile deals damage, whether or not to immediately destroy this projectile.
destroy_on_hurt.title: Destroy On Hurt

filter.description: Entity Definitions defined here can't be hurt by the projectile.
filter.title: Filter

fire_affected_by_griefing.description: If true, whether the projectile causes fire is affected by the mob griefing game rule.
fire_affected_by_griefing.title: Fire Affected By Griefing

gravity.description: The gravity applied to this entity when thrown. When this actor is not on the ground, subtracts this amount from the actors change in vertical position every tick. The higher the value, the faster the entity falls.
gravity.title: Gravity

hit_ground_sound.description: The sound that plays when the projectile hits the ground.
hit_ground_sound.title: Hit Ground Sound

hit_sound.description: The sound that plays when the projectile hits something.
hit_sound.title: Hit Sound

homing.description: If true, the projectile homes in to the nearest entity.
homing.title: Homing

inertia.description: The fraction of the projectile's speed maintained every frame while traveling in air.
inertia.title: Inertia

is_dangerous.description: If true, the projectile will be treated as dangerous to the players.
is_dangerous.title: Is Dangerous

knockback.description: If true, the projectile will knock back the entity it hits.
knockback.title: Knockback

lightning.description: If true, the entity hit will be struck by lightning.
lightning.title: Lightning

liquid_inertia.description: The fraction of the projectile's speed maintained every frame while traveling in water.
liquid_inertia.title: Liquid Inertia

multiple_targets.description: If true, the projectile can hit multiple entities per flight.
multiple_targets.title: Multiple Targets

offset.description: The offset from the entity's anchor where the projectile will spawn.
offset.title: Offset

on_fire_time.description: Time in seconds that the entity hit will be on fire for.
on_fire_time.title: On Fire Time

on_hit.description: Defines the behaviors that may execute on a projectile's hit, including impact damage, impact effect, and stuck in ground. See more on these parameters below.
on_hit.title: On Hit

arrow_effect.title: Arrow Effect
arrow_effect.description: The target receives a mob effect. See the table below for all arrow_effect parameters.

apply_effect_to_blocking_targets.title: Apply Effect To Blocking Targets
apply_effect_to_blocking_targets.description: If true, the effect will be applied to blocking targets.

catch_fire.title: Catch Fire
catch_fire.description: Determines if the struck object is set on fire.

definition_event.title: Definition Event
definition_event.description: The event that is triggered on a hit. See the table below for all definition event parameters.

affect_projectile.title: Affect Projectile
affect_projectile.description: The projectile that will be affected by this event.

affect_shooter.title: Affect Shooter
affect_shooter.description: The shooter that will be affected by this event.

affect_splash_area.title: Affect Splash Area
affect_splash_area.description: All entities in the splash area will be affected by this event.

affect_target.title: Affect Target
affect_target.description: The target will be affected by this event.

event_trigger.title: Event Trigger
event_trigger.description: The event triggered. Also has an option filters parameter to limit affected targets.

splash_area.title: Splash Area
splash_area.description: The splash area that will be affected.

douse_fire.title: Douse Fire
douse_fire.description: If the target is on fire, then douse hte fire.

freeze_on_hit.title: Freeze On Hit
freeze_on_hit.description: An area of entities that is frozen to block on hits. Has shape of either sphere or cube, snap_to_block boolean ,and size decimal properties.

shape.description: The shape of the area that is frozen.
shape.title: Shape

snap_to_block.description: If true, the area will snap to the nearest block.
snap_to_block.title: Snap To Block

size.description: The size of the area that is frozen.
size.title: Size

grant_xp.title: Grant XP
grant_xp.description: Grants XP on hit. Has minXP for minimum XP granted, maxXp for maximum, or simply flat xp properties.

hurt_owner.title: Hurt Owner
hurt_owner.description: Determines if the owner of the entity is hurt on hit. Contains decimal owner_damage, knockback boolean, and ignite boolean.

owner_damage.title: Owner Damage
owner_damage.description: The amount of damage the owner will take.

knockback.title: Knockback
knockback.description: If true, the owner will be knocked back.

ignite.title: Ignite
ignite.description: If true, the owner will be set on fire.

ignite.title: Ignite
ignite.description: Determines if a fire may be started on a flammable target.

impact_damage.title: Impact Damage
impact_damage.description: Defines the damage that an entity may receive on being hit by this projectile. See the table below for all impact_damage parameters.

catch_fire.title: Catch Fire
catch_fire.description: Determines if the struck object is set on fire.

channeling.title: Channeling
channeling.description: Whether lightning can be channeled through hte weapon.

destroy_on_hit_requires_damage.title: Destroy On Hit Requires Damage
destroy_on_hit_requires_damage.description: If true, then the hit must cause damage to destroy the projectile.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: The identifier of an entity that can be hit.

knockback.title: Knockback
knockback.description: If true, the projectile will knock back the entity it hits.

power_multiplier.title: Power Multiplier
power_multiplier.description: How much the base damage is multiplied.

semi_random_diff_damage.title: Semi Random Diff Damage
semi_random_diff_damage.description: If true, damage will be randomized based on damage and speed.

set_last_hurt_requires_damage.title: Set Last Hurt Requires Damage
set_last_hurt_requires_damage.description: If true, then the hit must cause damage to update the last hurt property.

mob_effect.description: The target receives a mob effect. See the table below for all mob_effect parameters.

ambient.title: Ambient
ambient.description: If true, a mob will spawn that is not hostile, like the bat entity in Minecraft.

amplifier.title: Amplifier
amplifier.description: The multiplier of the amplification of this effect.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The effect's duration.

durationeasy.title: Duration Easy
durationeasy.description: The effect's duration on easy mode.

durationhard.title: Duration Hard
durationhard.description: The effect's duration on hard mode.

durationnormal.title: Duration Normal
durationnormal.description: The effect's duration on normal mode.

effect.title: Effect

on_fire_time.title: On Fire Time

particle_on_hit.title: Particle On Hit

num_particles.description: The number of particles to spawn.

on_other_hit.title: On Other Hit
on_other_hit.description: If true, spawns particles on any other hit.

particle_type.title: Particle Type
particle_type.description: The id of the particle to spawn on hit.

potion_effect.title: Potion Effect

When the trades are converted, the mob will generate a new trade list with their new trade table, but then it will try to convert any of the same trades over to have the same enchantments and user data. For example, if the original has a Emerald to Enchanted Iron Sword (Sharpness 1), and the new trade also has an Emerald for Enchanted Iron Sword, then the enchantment will be Sharpness 1.

sound_interval.title: Sound Interval
sound_interval.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again.

CJD.title: Avoid Block
CJD.description: Allows this entity to avoid certain blocks.

search_range.title: Search Range
search_range.description: Maximum distance to look for a block in xz.

search_height.title: Search Height

sprint_speed_modifier.title: Sprint Speed Modifier
sprint_speed_modifier.description: Modifier for sprint speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the sprint speed faster.

target_blocks.title: Target Blocks
target_blocks.description: List of block types this mob avoids.

avoid_block_sound.title: Avoid Block Sound
avoid_block_sound.description: The sound event to play when the mob is avoiding a block.

walk_speed_modifier.title: Walk Speed Modifier
walk_speed_modifier.description: Modifier for walking speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the walking speed faster.

sound_interval.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again.

cooldown.title: Cooldown
cooldown.description: The amount of time in seconds that the mob has to wait before selecting a target of the same type again

max_dist.description: Maximum distance this mob can be away to be a valid choice.
max_dist.title: Maximum Dist

must_see.description: If true, the mob has to be visible to be a valid choice.
must_see.title: Must See

must_see_forget_duration.description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more.
must_see_forget_duration.title: Must See Forget Duration

reevaluate_description.title: Reevaluate Description
reevaluate_description.description: If true, the mob will stop being targeted if it stops meeting any conditions.

sprint_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the running speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged
sprint_speed_multiplier.title: Sprint Speed Multiplier

walk_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the walking speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged
walk_speed_multiplier.title: Walk Speed Multiplier

CJE.title: Avoid Mob Type
CJE.description: Allows the entity to run away from other entities that meet the criteria specified.

avoid_mob_sound.title: Avoid Mob Sound
avoid_mob_sound.description: The sound event to play when the mob is avoiding another mob.

avoid_target_xz.title: Avoid Target XZ
avoid_target_xz.description: The next target position the entity chooses to avoid another entity will be chosen within this XZ Distance.

avoid_target_y.title: Avoid Target Y
avoid_target_y.description: The next target position the entity chooses to avoid another entity will be chosen within this Y Distance.

ignore_visibilty.title: Ignore Visibilty
ignore_visibilty.description: Whether or not to ignore direct line of sight while this entity is running away from other specified entities.

max_dist.title: Max Dist
max_dist.description: Maximum distance to look for an avoid target for the entity.

max_flee.title: Max Flee
max_flee.description: How many blocks away from its avoid target the entity must be for it to stop fleeing from the avoid target.

probability_per_strength.title: Probability Per Strength
probability_per_strength.description: Percent chance this entity will stop avoiding another entity based on that entity's strength, where 1.0 = 100%.

remove_target.title: Remove Target
remove_target.description: Determine if we should remove target when fleeing or not.

sprint_distance.title: Sprint Distance
sprint_distance.description: How many blocks within range of its avoid target the entity must be for it to begin sprinting away from the avoid target.

sprint_speed_multiplier.title: Sprint Speed Multiplier
sprint_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for sprint speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the sprint speed faster.

walk_speed_multiplier.title: Walk Speed Multiplier
walk_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for walking speed. 1.0 means keep the regular speed, while higher numbers make the walking speed faster.

ignore_visibility.description: If true, visbility between this entity and the mob type will not be checked.
ignore_visibility.title: Ignore Visibility

entity_types.title: Entity Types
entity_types.description: The list of conditions another entity must meet to be a valid target to avoid.

on_escape_event.title: On Escape Event
on_escape_event.description: Event that is triggered when escaping from a mob.

sound_interval.title: Sound Interval
sound_interval.description: The range of time in seconds to randomly wait before playing the sound again.

CJG.title: Barter
CJG.description: Enables the mob to barter for items that have been configured as barter currency. Must be used in combination with the barter component

CJH.title: Beg
CJH.description: Allows this mob to look at and follow the player that holds food they like.

items.description: List of items that this mob likes.
List of items that this mob likes.
items.title: Properties
Properties

look_distance.description: Distance in blocks the mob will beg from.
look_distance.title: Look Distance

look_time.description: The range of time in seconds this mob will stare at the player holding a food they like, begging for it.
look_time.title: Look Time

CJJ.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal.
CJJ.title: Speed Multiplier

CJI.title: Break Door
CJI.description: Allows this mob to break doors.

DAA.title: Breed
DAA.description: Allows this mob to breed with other mobs.

DAB.title: Celebrate Survive
DAB.description: Allows this entity to celebrate surviving a raid by shooting fireworks.

fireworks_interval.title: Fireworks Interval
fireworks_interval.description: Minimum and maximum time between firework (positive, in seconds).

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The duration in seconds that the celebration lasts for.

on_celebration_end_event.title: On Celebration End Event
on_celebration_end_event.description: The event to trigger when the goal's duration expires.

DAC.title: Celebrate
DAC.description: Allows this entity to celebrate surviving a raid by making celebration sounds and jumping.

celebration_sound.description: The sound event to trigger during the celebration.
celebration_sound.title: Celebration Sound

duration.description: The duration in seconds that the celebration lasts for.
duration.title: Duration

jump_interval.description: Minimum and maximum time between jumping (positive, in seconds).
jump_interval.title: Jump Interval

on_celebration_end_event.description: The event to trigger when the goal's duration expires.
on_celebration_end_event.title: On Celebration End Event

sound_interval.description: Minimum and maximum time between sound events (positive, in seconds).
sound_interval.title: Sound Interval

DAD.title: Charge Attack
DAD.description: Allows this entity to damage a target by using a running attack.

max_distance.title: Max Distance
max_distance.description: A charge attack cannot start if the entity is farther than this distance to the target.

min_distance.title: Min Distance
min_distance.description: A charge attack cannot start if the entity is closer than this distance to the target.

success_rate.title: Success Rate
success_rate.description: Percent chance this entity will start a charge attack, if not already attacking (1.0 = 100%)

DAE.title: Charge Held Item
DAE.description: Allows an entity to charge and use their held item.

items.title: Items
items.description: The list of items that can be used to charge the held item. This list is required and must have at least one item in it.
Items names to be used.
items.title: Item ID

DAF.title: Circle Around Anchor
DAF.description: Causes an entity to circle around an anchor point placed near a point or target.

radius_range.description: Horizontal distance from the anchor point this entity must stay within upon a successful radius adjustment.
radius_range.title: Radius Range

radius_change_chance.description: A random value to determine when to increase the size of the radius up to the maximum. This has a 1/value chance every tick to do so.
radius_change_chance.title: Radius Change Chance

height_above_target_range.description: The number of blocks above the target that the next anchor point can be set. This value is used only when the entity is tracking a target.
height_above_target_range.title: Height Above Target Range

height_offset_range.description: The range of height in blocks offset the mob can have from it's anchor point.
height_offset_range.title: Height Offset Range

height_change_chance.description: A random value to determine when to change the height of the mob from the anchor point. This has a 1/value chance every tick to do so.
height_change_chance.title: Height Change Chance

goal_radius.description: Maximum distance from the anchor-point in which this entity considers itself to have reached the anchor point. This is to prevent the entity from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot.
goal_radius.title: Goal Radius

radius_change.title: Radius Change
radius_change.description: The number of blocks to increase the current movement radius by, upon successful `radius_adjustment_chance`. If the current radius increases over the range maximum, the current radius will be set back to the range minimum and the entity will change between clockwise and counter-clockwise movement.

radius_adjustment_chance.title: Radius Adjustment Chance
radius_adjustment_chance.description: Percent chance to determine how often to increase the size of the current movement radius around the anchor point. 1 = 100%. `radius_change_chance` is deprecated and has been replaced with `radius_adjustment_chance`.

height_adjustment_chance.title: Height Adjustment Chance
height_adjustment_chance.description: Percent chance to determine how often to increase or decrease the current height around the anchor point. 1 = 100%. `height_change_chance` is deprecated and has been replaced with `height_adjustment_chance`.

angle_change.title: Angle Change
angle_change.description: Number of degrees to change this entity's facing by, when the entity selects its next anchor point.

DAG.title: Controlled By Player
DAG.description: Allows the entity to be controlled by the player using an item in the item_controllable property (required). Also requires the minecraft:movement property, and the minecraft:rideable property. On every tick, the entity will attempt to rotate towards where the player is facing with the control item whilst simultaneously moving forward.

fractional_rotation.title: Fractional Rotation
fractional_rotation.description: The entity will attempt to rotate to face where the player is facing each tick. The entity will target this percentage of their difference in their current facing angles each tick (from 0.0 to 1.0 where 1.0 = 100%). This is limited by FractionalRotationLimit. A value of 0.0 will result in the entity no longer turning to where the player is facing.

fractional_rotation_limit.title: Fractional Rotation Limit
fractional_rotation_limit.description: Limits the total degrees the entity can rotate to face where the player is facing on each tick.

mount_speed_multiplier.title: Mount Speed Multiplier
mount_speed_multiplier.description: Speed multiplier of mount when controlled by player.

items.description: The X component.
items.title: X

items.description: The Y component.
items.title: Y

DAH.title: Croak
DAH.description: [EXPERIMENTAL BEHAVIOR] Allows the entity to croak at a random time interval with configurable conditions.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Random range in seconds after which the croaking stops. Can also be a constant.

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: Conditions for the behavior to start and keep running. The interval between runs only starts after passing the filters.

interval.title: Interval
interval.description: Random range in seconds between runs of this behavior. Can also be a constant.

DBA.title: Defend Trusted Target
DBA.description: Allows the mob to target another mob that hurts an entity it trusts.

aggro_sound.title: Aggro Sound
aggro_sound.description: Sound to occasionally play while defending.

must_see.title: Must See
must_see.description: If true, only entities in this mob's viewing range can be selected as targets.

must_see_forget_duration.title: Must See Forget Duration
must_see_forget_duration.description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more.

on_defend_start.title: On Defend Start
on_defend_start.description: The event to run when this mob starts to defend the entity it trusts.

within_radius.title: Within Radius
within_radius.description: Distance in blocks that the target can be within to launch an attack.

entity_types.description: List of entity types that this mob considers valid targets.
entity_types.title: Entity Types

sound_chance.title: Sound Chance
sound_chance.description: Probability that a sound will play.

DBB.title: Defend Village Target
DBB.description: Allows the entity to stay in a village and defend the village from aggressors. If a player is in bad standing with the village this goal will cause the entity to attack the player regardless of filter conditions.

entity_types.title: Entity Types
entity_types.description: List of entity types this mob considers a threat to the village.

must_reach.title: Must Reach
must_reach.description: The entity must be able to reach attacker.

attack_chance.title: Attack Chance
attack_chance.description: The percentage chance that the entity has to attack aggressors of its village, where 1.0 = 100%.

DBC.title: Delayed Attack
DBC.description: Allows an entity to attack, while also delaying the damage-dealt until a specific time in the attack animation.

attack_duration.title: Attack Duration
attack_duration.description: The entity's attack animation will play out over this duration (in seconds). Also controls attack cooldown.

attack_once.title: Attack Once
attack_once.description: Allows the entity to use this attack behavior, only once EVER.

attack_types.title: Attack Types
attack_types.description: Defines the entity types this entity will attack.

can_spread_on_fire.title: Can Spread On Fire
can_spread_on_fire.description: If the entity is on fire, this allows the entity's target to catch on fire after being hi

hit_delay_pct.title: Hit Delay Pct
hit_delay_pct.description: The percentage into the attack animation to apply the damage of the attack (1.0 = 100%).

inner_boundary_time_increase.title: Inner Boundary Time Increase
inner_boundary_time_increase.description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when the target is beyond the "path_inner_boundary".

max_path_time.title: Max Path Time
max_path_time.description: Maximum base time (in seconds) to recalculate new attack path to target (before increases applied).

melee_fov.title: Melee Fov
melee_fov.description: Field of view (in degrees) when using the sensing component to detect an attack target.

min_path_time.title: Min Path Time
min_path_time.description: Minimum base time (in seconds) to recalculate new attack path to target (before increases applied).

on_attack.title: On Attack
on_attack.description: Defines the event to trigger when this entity successfully attacks.

outer_boundary_time_increase.title: Outer Boundary Time Increase
outer_boundary_time_increase.description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when the target is beyond the "path_outer_boundary".

path_fail_time_increase.title: Path Fail Time Increase
path_fail_time_increase.description: Time (in seconds) to add to attack path recalculation when this entity cannot move along the current path.

path_inner_boundary.title: Path Inner Boundary
path_inner_boundary.description: Distance at which to increase attack path recalculation by "inner_boundary_tick_increase".

path_outer_boundary.title: Path Outer Boundary
path_outer_boundary.description: Distance at which to increase attack path recalculation by "outer_boundary_tick_increase".

random_stop_interval.title: Random Stop Interval
random_stop_interval.description: This entity will have a 1 in N chance to stop it's current attack, where N = "random_stop_interval".

reach_multiplier.title: Reach Multiplier
reach_multiplier.description: Used with the base size of the entity to determine minimum target-distance before trying to deal attack damage.

require_complete_path.title: Require Complete Path
require_complete_path.description: Toggles (on/off) the need to have a full path from the entity to the target when using this melee attack behavior.

set_persistent.title: Set Persistent
set_persistent.description: Allows the actor to be set to persist upon targeting a player.

track_target.title: Track Target
track_target.description: Allows the entity to track the attack target, even if the entity has no sensing.

x_max_rotation.title: X Max Rotation
x_max_rotation.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

y_max_head_rotation.title: Y Max Head Rotation
y_max_head_rotation.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the Y-axis, this entity can rotate its head while trying to look at the target.

DBD.title: Dig
DBD.description: [EXPERIMENTAL BEHAVIOR] Activates the `DIGGING` actor flag during the specified duration. Currently only Warden can use the Dig goal

allow_dig_when_named.title: Allow Dig When Named
allow_dig_when_named.description: If true, this behavior can run when this entity is named. Otherwise not.

digs_in_daylight.title: Digs In Daylight
digs_in_daylight.description: Indicates that the actor should start digging when it sees daylight.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Goal duration in seconds.

idle_time.title: Idle Time
idle_time.description: The minimum idle time in seconds between the last detected disturbance to the start of digging.

suspicion_is_disturbance.title: Suspicion Is Disturbance
suspicion_is_disturbance.description: If true, finding new suspicious locations count as disturbances that may delay the start of this goal.

vibration_is_disturbance.title: Vibration Is Disturbance
vibration_is_disturbance.description: If true, vibrations count as disturbances that may delay the start of this goal.

DBE.title: Door Interact
DBE.description: Allows the mob to open and close doors.

DBF.title: Dragonchargeplayer
DBF.description: Allows this entity to attack a player by charging at them. The player is chosen by the "minecraft:behavior.dragonscanning". Note: This behavior can only be used by the ender_dragon entity type.

active_speed.title: Active Speed
active_speed.description: The speed this entity moves when this behavior has started or while it's active.

continue_charge_threshold_time.title: Continue Charge Threshold Time
continue_charge_threshold_time.description: If the dragon is outside the "target_zone" for longer than "continue_charge_threshold_time" seconds, the charge is canceled.

flight_speed.title: Flight Speed
flight_speed.description: The speed this entity moves while this behavior is not active.

target_zone.title: Target Zone
target_zone.description: Minimum and maximum distance, from the target, this entity can use this behavior.

turn_speed.title: Turn Speed
turn_speed.description: The speed at which this entity turns while using this behavior.

DBG.title: Dragondeath
DBG.description: Controls the entity's death state and animation. Note: This behavior can only be used by the ender_dragon entity type.

DBH.title: Dragonflaming
DBH.description: Allows this entity to use a flame-breath attack. Note: This behavior can only be used by the ender_dragon entity type.

cooldown_time.title: Cooldown Time
cooldown_time.description: Time (in seconds), after roar, to breath flame.

flame_time.title: Flame Time
flame_time.description: Time (in seconds), after roar, to breath flame.

ground_flame_count.title: Ground Flame Count
ground_flame_count.description: Number of ground flame-breath attacks to use before flight-takeoff.

roar_time.title: Roar Time
roar_time.description: Time (in seconds) to roar, before breathing flame.

DBI.title: Dragonholdingpattern
DBI.description: Allows the Dragon to fly around in a circle around the center podium. Note: This behavior can only be used by the ender_dragon entity type.

DBJ.title: Dragonlanding
DBJ.description: Allows the Dragon to stop flying and transition into perching mode. Note: This behavior can only be used by the ender_dragon entity type.

DCA.title: Dragonscanning
DCA.description: Allows an entity to look around for a player to attack while in perch mode. Note: This behavior can only be used by the ender_dragon entity type.

DCB.title: Dragonstrafeplayer
DCB.description: Allows this entity to fly around looking for a player to shoot fireballs at. Note: This behavior can only be used by the ender_dragon entity type.

active_speed.title: Active Speed
active_speed.description: The speed this entity moves when this behavior has started or while it's active.

fireball_range.title: Fireball Range
fireball_range.description: Maximum distance of this entity's fireball attack while strafing.

flight_speed.title: Flight Speed
flight_speed.description: The speed this entity moves while this behavior is not active.

switch_direction_probability.title: Switch Direction Probability
switch_direction_probability.description: Percent chance to to switch this entity's strafe direction between clockwise and counterclockwise. Switch direction chance occurs each time a new target is chosen (1.0 = 100%).

target_in_range_and_in_view_time.title: Target In Range And In View Time
target_in_range_and_in_view_time.description: Time (in seconds) the target must be in fireball range, and in view [ie, no solid terrain in-between the target and this entity], before a fireball can be shot.

target_zone.title: Target Zone
target_zone.description: Minimum and maximum distance, from the target, this entity can use this behavior.

turn_speed.title: Turn Speed
turn_speed.description: The speed at which this entity turns while using this behavior.

view_angle.title: View Angle
view_angle.description: The target must be within "view_angle" degrees of the dragon's current rotation before a fireball can be shot.

DCC.title: Dragontakeoff
DCC.description: Allows an entity to leave perch mode and go back to flying around. Note: This behavior can only be used by the ender_dragon entity type.

DCD.title: Drink Milk
DCD.description: Allows the mob to drink milk based on specified environment conditions.

cooldown_seconds.title: Cooldown Seconds
cooldown_seconds.description: Time (in seconds) that the goal is on cooldown before it can be used again.

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: Conditions that need to be met for the behavior to start.

DCE.title: Drink Potion
DCE.description: Allows the mob to drink potions based on specified environment conditions.

speed_modifier.description: Movement speed modifier of the mob when using this AI Goal.
speed_modifier.title: Speed Modifier

potions.description: A list of potions that this entity can drink.
potions.title: Potions

items.description: A potions that this entity can drink.
items.title: Potions

id.description: The registry ID of the potion to use.
id.title: Id

chance.description: The percent chance (from 0.0 to 1.0) of this potion being selected when searching for a potion to use.
chance.title: Chance

filters.description: The filters to use when determining if this potion can be selected.

DCF.description: Allows the entity to move toward a target, and drop an item near the target. This goal requires a "minecraft:navigation" to execute.
DCF.title: Drop Item For

entity_types.description: The list of conditions another entity must meet to be a valid target to drop an item for.
entity_types.title: Entity Types

cooldown.title: Cooldown
cooldown.description: Total time that the goal is on cooldown before it can be used again.

drop_item_chance.title: Drop Item Chance
drop_item_chance.description: The percent chance the entity will drop an item when using this goal.

goal_radius.title: Goal Radius
goal_radius.description: Distance in blocks within the entity considers it has reached it's target position.

loot_table.title: Loot Table
loot_table.description: The loot table that contains the possible loot the entity can drop with this goal.

max_head_look_at_height.title: Max Head Look At Height
max_head_look_at_height.description: The maximum height the entities head will look at when dropping the item. The entity will always be looking at its target.

minimum_teleport_distance.title: Minimum Teleport Distance
minimum_teleport_distance.description: If the target position is farther away than this distance on any tick, the entity will teleport to the target position.

offering_distance.title: Offering Distance
offering_distance.description: The preferred distance the entity tries to be from the target it is dropping an item for.

on_drop_attempt.title: On Drop Attempt
on_drop_attempt.description: The event to trigger when the entity attempts to drop an item.

search_count.title: Search Count
search_count.description: The number of blocks each tick that the entity will check within its search range and height for a valid block to move to. A value of 0 will have the mob check every block within range in one tick.

search_height.title: Search Height
search_height.description: The Height in blocks the entity will search within to find a valid target position.

search_range.title: Search Range
search_range.description: The distance in blocks the entity will search within to find a valid target position.

seconds_before_pickup.title: Seconds Before Pickup
seconds_before_pickup.description: The numbers of seconds that will pass before the dropped entity can be picked up from the ground.

target_range.title: Target Range
target_range.description: The range in blocks within which the entity searches to find a target to drop an item for.

teleport_offset.title: Teleport Offset
teleport_offset.description: When the entity teleports, offset the teleport position by this many blocks in the X, Y, and Z coordinate.

time_of_day_range.title: Time Of Day Range
time_of_day_range.description: The valid times of day that this goal can be used. For reference: noon is 0.0, sunset is 0.25, midnight is 0.5, and sunrise is 0.75, and back to noon for 1.0.

DCG.title: Eat Block
DCG.description: Allows the entity to consume a block, replace the eaten block with another block, and trigger an event as a result.

on_eat.title: On Eat
on_eat.description: The event to trigger when the block eating animation has completed.

success_chance.title: Succes Chance
success_chance.description: A molang expression defining the success chance the entity has to consume a block.

time_until_eat.title: Time Until Eat
time_until_eat.description: The amount of time (in seconds) it takes for the block to be eaten upon a successful eat attempt.

eat_and_replace_block_pairs.title: Eat And Replace Block Pairs
eat_and_replace_block_pairs.description: A collection of pairs of blocks; the first ("eat_block")is the block the entity should eat, the second ("replace_block") is the block that should replace the eaten block.

items.title: Eat And Replace Block Pair
items.description: The block to eat and the block to replace it with.

replace_block.title: Replace Block
replace_block.description: The block to replace the eaten block with.

DCH.title: Eat Carried Item
DCH.description: If the mob is carrying a food item, the mob will eat it and the effects will be applied to the mob.

delay_before_eating.description: Time in seconds the mob should wait before eating the item.
delay_before_eating.title: Delay Before Eating

DCI.title: Eat Mob
DCI.description: [EXPERIMENTAL BEHAVIOR] Allows the entity to eat a specified Mob.

eat_animation_time.title: Eat Animation Time
eat_animation_time.description: Sets the time in seconds the eat animation should play for.

eat_mob_sound.title: Eat Mob Sound
eat_mob_sound.description: Sets the sound that should play when eating a mob.

loot_table.title: Loot Table
loot_table.description: The loot table for loot to be dropped when eating a mob.

pull_in_force.title: Pull In Force
pull_in_force.description: Sets the force which the mob-to-be-eaten is pulled towards the eating mob.

reach_mob_distance.title: Reach Mob Distance
reach_mob_distance.description: Sets the desired distance to be reached before eating the mob.

run_speed.title: Run Speed
run_speed.description: Sets the entity's speed when running toward the target.

DCJ.title: Enderman Leave Block
DCJ.description: Allows the enderman to drop a block they are carrying. Can only be used by Endermen.

DDA.title: Enderman Take Block
DDA.description: Allows the enderman to take a block and carry it around. Can only be used by Endermen.

DDB.title: Equip Item
DDB.description: The entity puts on the desired equipment.

DDC.title: Explore Outskirts
DDC.description: Allows the entity to first travel to a random point on the outskirts of the village, and then explore random points within a small distance. This goal requires "minecraft:dweller" and "minecraft:navigation" to execute.

dist_from_boundary.title: Dist From Boundary
dist_from_boundary.description: The distance from the boundary the villager must be within in to explore the outskirts.

explore_dist.title: Explore Dist
explore_dist.description: Total distance in blocks the the entity will explore beyond the village bounds when choosing its travel point.

max_travel_time.title: Max Travel Time
max_travel_time.description: This is the maximum amount of time an entity will attempt to reach it's travel point on the outskirts of the village before the goal exits.

max_wait_time.title: Max Wait Time
max_wait_time.description: The wait time in seconds between choosing new explore points will be chosen on a random interval between this value and the minimum wait time. This value is also the total amount of time the entity will explore random points before the goal stops.

min_dist_from_target.title: Min Dist From Target
min_dist_from_target.description: The entity must be within this distance for it to consider it has successfully reached its target.

min_perimeter.title: Min Perimeter
min_perimeter.description: The minimum perimeter of the village required to run this goal.

min_wait_time.title: Min Wait Time

next_y.description: A new explore point will randomly be chosen within this Y distance of the current target position when navigation has finished and the wait timer has elapsed.

timer_ratio.description: Each new explore point will be chosen on a random interval between the minimum and the maximum wait time, divided by this value. This does not apply to the first explore point chosen when the goal runs.

DDD.title: Fertilize Farm Block
DDD.description: Allows the mob to search within an area for a growable crop block. If found, the mob will use any available fertilizer in their inventory on the crop. This goal will not execute if the mob does not have a fertilizer item in its inventory.

goal_radius.title: Goal Radius
goal_radius.description: Distance in blocks within the mob considers it has reached it's target position.

max_fertilizer_usage.title: Maximum Fertilizer Usage
max_fertilizer_usage.description: The maximum number of times the mob will use fertilzer on the target block.

search_cooldown_max_seconds.title: Search Cooldown Maximum Seconds
search_cooldown_max_seconds.description: The maximum amount of time in seconds that the goal can take before searching again. The time is chosen between 0 and this number.

search_count.title: Search Count
search_count.description: The number of randomly selected blocks each tick that the mob will check within its search range and height for a valid block to move to. A value of 0 will have the mob check every block within range in one tick.

search_height.title: Search Height
search_height.description: The Height in blocks the mob will search within to find a valid target position.

search_range.title: Search Range
search_range.description: The distance in blocks the mob will search within to find a valid target position.

DDE.title: Find Cover
DDE.description: Allows the mob to seek shade.

cooldown_time.title: Cooldown Time

DDF.description: Allows the mob to look around for another mob to ride atop it.

avoid_water.title: Avoid Water
avoid_water.description: If true, the mob will not go into water blocks when going towards a mount.

mount_distance.title: Mount Distance
mount_distance.description: This is the distance the mob needs to be, in blocks, from the desired mount to mount it. If the value is below 0, the mob will use its default attack distance

start_delay.title: Start Delay
start_delay.description: Time the mob will wait before starting to move towards the mount.

target_needed.description: If true, the mob will only look for a mount if it has a target.

within_radius.title: Within Radius
within_radius.description: Distance in blocks within which the mob will look for a mount.

max_failed_attempts.title: Maximum Failed Attempts
max_failed_attempts.description: The number of failed attempts to make before this goal is no longer used.

DDG.title: Find Underwater Treasure
DDG.description: Allows the mob to move towards the nearest underwater ruin or shipwreck.

stop_distance.description: The distance the mob will move before stopping.

DDH.title: Flee Sun
DDH.description: Allows the mob to run away from direct sunlight and seek shade.

DDI.title: Float Wander

y_dist.description: Distance in blocks that the mob will look up or down for a new spot to move to. Must be at least 1

random_reselect.description: If true, the mob will randomly pick a new point while moving to the previously selected one.

throw_sound.title: Throw Sound

vertical_throw_mul.title: Vertical Throw Mul

If found, the entity will replace the air block by planting a seed item from its inventory on the farmland block. This goal requires "minecraft:inventory" and "minecraft:navigation" to execute. This goal will not execute if the entity does not have an item in its inventory.

EEF.title: Swim With Entity
EEF.description: Allows the entity follow another entity. Both entities must be swimming and in water.

success_rate.title: Success Rate
success_rate.description: Percent chance to start following another entity, if not already doing so. 1.0 = 100%

chance_to_stop.title: Chance To Stop
chance_to_stop.description: Percent chance to stop following the current entity, if they're riding another entity or they're not swimming. 1.0 = 100%

state_check_interval.title: State Check Interval
state_check_interval.description: Time (in seconds) between checks to determine if this entity should catch up to the entity being followed or match the direction of the entity being followed.

catch_up_threshold.title: Catch Up Threshold
catch_up_threshold.description: Distance, from the entity being followed, at which this entity will speed up to reach that entity.

match_direction_threshold.title: Match Direction Threshold
match_direction_threshold.description: Distance, from the entity being followed, at which this entity will try to match that entity's direction.

catch_up_multiplier.title: Catch Up Multiplier
catch_up_multiplier.description: The multiplier this entity's speed is modified by when matching another entity's direction.

search_range.title: Search Range
search_range.description: Radius around this entity to search for another entity to follow.

stop_distance.title: Stop Distance
stop_distance.description: Distance, from the entity being followed, at which this entity will stop following that entity.

entity_types.title: Entity Types
entity_types.description: Filters which determine what entites are valid to follow.

EEG.description: Allows the mob to move to attack a target. The goal ends if it has a horizontal collision or gets hit. Built to be used with flying mobs.
EEG.title: Swoop Attack

damage_reach.title: Damage Reach
damage_reach.description: Added to the base size of the entity, to determine the target's maximum allowable distance, when trying to deal attack damage.

delay_range.description: Minimum and maximum cooldown time-range (in seconds) between each attempted swoop attack.
delay_range.title: Delay Range

EEH.description: Can only be used by Villagers. Allows the mob to accept flowers from Iron Golems.
EEH.title: Take Flower

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: Conditions that need to be met for the behavior to start.

max_head_rotation_y.title: Max Head Rotation Y
max_head_rotation_y.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the Y-axis, this entity can rotate its head while trying to look at the target.

max_rotation_x.title: Max Rotation X
max_rotation_x.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

max_wait_time.title: Max Wait Time
max_wait_time.description: The maximum amount of time (in seconds) for the mob to randomly wait for before taking the flower.

min_distance_to_target.title: Min Distance To Target
min_distance_to_target.description: Minimum distance (in blocks) for the entity to be considered having reached its target.

min_wait_time.title: Min Wait Time
min_wait_time.description: The minimum amount of time (in seconds) for the mob to randomly wait for before taking the flower.

search_area.title: Search Area
search_area.description: The dimensions of the AABB used to search for a potential mob to take a flower from.

EEI.description: Allows an entity to select a valid target entity that pushed it.
EEI.title: Target When Pushed

entity_types.title: Entity Types
entity_types.description: The list of conditions the other entity must meet to be a valid target.

percent_chance.title: Percent Chance
percent_chance.description: Probability that the entity will target the entity that pushed it.

EEJ.description: Allows an entity to be tempted by a set item.
EEJ.title: Tempt

can_get_scared.description: If true, the mob can stop being tempted if the player moves too fast while close to this mob.
can_get_scared.title: Can Get Scared

can_tempt_while_ridden.title: Can Tempt While Ridden
can_tempt_while_ridden.description: If true, the mob can be tempted even if it has a passenger (i.e. if being ridden).

can_tempt_vertically.title: Can Tempt Vertically
can_tempt_vertically.description: If true, vertical distance to the player will be considered when tempting.

items.title: Items
items.description: List of items this mob is tempted by.

sound_interval.description: Range of random ticks to wait between tempt sounds.
sound_interval.title: Sound Interval

tempt_sound.description: Sound to play while the mob is being tempted.
tempt_sound.title: Tempt Sound

within_radius.description: Distance in blocks this mob can get tempted by a player holding an item they like.
within_radius.title: Within Radius

EFA.title: Timer Flag
EFA.description: Fires an event when this behavior starts, then waits for a duration before stopping. When stopping due to that timeout or due to being interrupted by another behavior, fires another event. query.timer_flag_<n> will return 1.0 on both the client and server when this behavior is running, and 0.0 otherwise.

on_end.title: On End
on_end.description: Event to run when the goal ends.

on_start.title: On Start
on_start.description: Event to run when the goal starts.

EFB.description: Allows this entity to locate a random target block that it can path find to. Once found, the entity will move towards it and dig up an item.
EFB.title: Random Look Around

find_valid_position_retries.title: Find Valid Position Retries
find_valid_position_retries.description: Amount of retries to find a valid target position within search range.

goal_radius.title: Goal Radius
goal_radius.description: Distance in blocks within the entity to considers it has reached it's target position.

item_table.title: Item Table
item_table.description: File path relative to the resource pack root for items to spawn list (loot table format).

on_digging_start.title: On Digging Start
on_digging_start.description: Event to run when the goal ends searching has begins digging.

on_fail_during_digging.title: On Fail During Digging
on_fail_during_digging.description: Event to run when the goal failed while in digging state.

on_fail_during_searching.title: On Fail During Searching
on_fail_during_searching.description: Event to run when the goal failed while in searching state.

on_item_found.title: On Item Found
on_item_found.description: Event to run when the goal find a item.

on_searching_start.title: On Searching Start
on_searching_start.description: Event to run when the goal starts searching.

on_success.title: On Success
on_success.description: Event to run when searching and digging has ended.

search_range_xz.title: Search Range XZ
search_range_xz.description: Width and length of the volume around the entity used to find a valid target position

search_range_y.title: Search Range Y
search_range_y.description: Height of the volume around the entity used to find a valid target position

spawn_item_after_seconds.title: Spawn Item After Seconds
spawn_item_after_seconds.description: Digging duration before spawning item in seconds.

spawn_item_pos_offset.title: Spawn Item Pos Offset
spawn_item_pos_offset.description: Distance to offset the item's spawn location in the direction the mob is facing.

target_blocks.title: Target Blocks
target_blocks.description: List of target block types the goal will look to dig on. Overrides the default list.

target_dig_position_offset.title: Target Dig Position Offset
target_dig_position_offset.description: Dig target position offset from the feet position of the mob in their facing direction.

EFC.description: Allows the mob to look at a player that is holding a tradable item.
EFC.title: Trade Interest

carried_item_switch_time.description: The Maximum time in seconds that the trader will hold an item before attempting to switch for a different item that takes the same trade.
carried_item_switch_time.title: Carried Item Switch Time

cooldown.description: The time in seconds before the trader can use this goal again.
cooldown.title: Cooldown

interest_time.description: The Maximum time in seconds that the trader will be interested with showing it's trade items.
interest_time.title: Interest_time

remove_item_time.description: The Maximum time in seconds that the trader will wait when you no longer have items to trade.
remove_item_time.title: Remove Item Time

within_radius.description: Distance in blocks this mob can be interested by a player holding an item they like.
within_radius.title: Within Radius

EFD.description: Allows the player to trade with this mob.
EFD.title: Trade With Player

EFE.description: Allows the mob to target the same entity its owner is targeting.
EFE.title: Vex Copy Owner Target

entity_types.description: List of entities this mob can copy the owner from.
entity_types.title: Entity Types

EFF.description: Allows the mob to move around randomly like the Vex.
EFF.title: Vex Random Move

entity_types.description: List of entities this mob can copy the owner from.
entity_types.title: Entity Types

EFG.description: Allows the wither to launch random attacks. Can only be used by the Wither Boss.
EFG.title: Wither Random Attack Pos Goal

EFH.description: Allows the wither to focus its attacks on whichever mob has dealt the most damage to it. Can only be used by the Wither Boss.
EFH.title: Wither Target Highest Damage

entity_types.description: List of entity types the wither takes into account to find who dealt the most damage to it.
entity_types.title: Entity Types

EFI.title: Work
EFI.description: Allows the NPC to use the POI.

active_time.title: Active Time
active_time.description: The amount of ticks the NPC will stay in their the work location.

can_work_in_rain.title: Can Work In Rain
can_work_in_rain.description: If true, this entity can work when their jobsite POI is being rained on.

goal_cooldown.title: Goal Cooldown
goal_cooldown.description: The amount of ticks the goal will be on cooldown before it can be used again.

on_arrival.title: On Arrival
on_arrival.description: Event to run when the mob reaches their jobsite.

sound_delay_max.title: Sound Delay Max
sound_delay_max.description: The max interval in which a sound will play.

sound_delay_min.title: Sound Delay Min
sound_delay_min.description: The min interval in which a sound will play.

work_in_rain_tolerance.title: Work In Rain Tolerance
work_in_rain_tolerance.description: If "can_work_in_rain" is false, this is the maximum number of ticks left in the goal where rain will not interrupt the goal

EFJ.description: Allows the NPC to use the composter POI to convert excess seeds into bone meal.
EFJ.title: Work Composter

active_time.title: Active Time
active_time.description: The amount of ticks the NPC will stay in their the work location.

block_interaction_max.title: Block Interaction Max
block_interaction_max.description: The maximum number of times the mob will interact with the composter.

can_empty_composter.title: Can Empty Composter
can_empty_composter.description: Determines whether the mob can empty a full composter.

can_fill_composter.title: Can Fill Composter
can_fill_composter.description: Determines whether the mob can add items to a composter given that it is not full.

can_work_in_rain.title: Can Work In Rain
can_work_in_rain.description: If true, this entity can work when their jobsite POI is being rained on.

goal_cooldown.title: Goal Cooldown
goal_cooldown.description: The amount of ticks the goal will be on cooldown before it can be used again.

items_per_use_max.title: Items Per Use Max
items_per_use_max.description: The maximum number of items which can be added to the composter per block interaction.

min_item_count.title: Min Item Count
min_item_count.description: Limits the amount of each compostable item the mob can use. Any amount held over this number will be composted if possible

on_arrival.title: On Arrival
on_arrival.description: Event to run when the mob reaches their jobsite.

use_block_max.title: Use Block Max
use_block_max.description: The maximum interval in which the mob will interact with the composter.

use_block_min.title: Use Block Min
use_block_min.description: The minimum interval in which the mob will interact with the composter.

work_in_rain_tolerance.title: Work In Rain Tolerance
work_in_rain_tolerance.description: If "can_work_in_rain" is false, this is the maximum number of ticks left in the goal where rain will not interrupt the goal
